item.title: Auto tools makefile getting started
item.description: Basic the Makefile format First make sure ~/.vimrc settings for tab spaces 1# define the .vimrc file to following contents 2cat ~/.vimrc 3set noexpandtab 4set autoindent Small snippet Makefile contents 1.DEFAULT_GOAL:=build 2 3fmt: 4 echo "this is fmt...." 5 6.PHONY:vet 7vet:fmt 8 echo "this is vet..." 9 10 11build:vet 12 echo "this is build..." In the directory execute make should display the result. 1echo "this is fmt...." 2this is fmt.... 3echo "this is vet.
